body:
### | Address: 71 Saddleland way Calgary, AB T3J 5J3  |  Tel: +1(587)889-1017  |  e-mail: lovudsharma@gmail.com |

**OBJECTIVE**
To obtain a challenging and rewarding web developer position where I can utilize my knowledge, proficiency, and skills to contribute to a company's growth.

**PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY**
● 1 year programming experience in HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap and Java/J2EE in web development.
● Extensive agile development experience.
● Experience in developing and integrating web applications and systems in a client-server environment.
● Skilled at grasping and adapting to new and complex technologies quickly.
● Deep understanding of business and technology essentials.
● Professional attitude with solid work ethic and unquestioned integrity.
● Self-Motivated, energetic with excellent analytical, organizational and creative skills.

**SKILL SETS**
➣Frameworks: Spring MVC, AngularJS, Hibernate, JPA      
➣Programming Languages: Java, C#, Javascript, J2ee
➣Front End: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 3, CMS                     
➣Databases: MySql, SQL, Oracle    
➣Version Control: GIT, Github, Bitbucket                              
➣IDE: Eclipse, STS   
➣Others: RESTful, JSON, SOAP, SAP Crystal Reports, Wordpress, GULP, Node.js, jUnit, MS Visio, Paradigm

**EXPERIENCE**
_Web Developer, Tink International Real Estate_
_Calgary, Alberta — June 2014 - November 2014_
Built web-based applications for the company using the latest and competitive technology that helped company to attract more clients from web. Made use of email API, sms API and I.P. tracking to meet the functional requirements.

**Accomplishments**
● Developed a highly scalable and well-tested system that runs the backbone of Tink International Real Estate.
● Design and implement a RESTful API in Java / Spring MVC / JPA
● Leveraged AngularJS to write well-structured code that powers thick-client, single page apps.
● An extremely good understanding of writing unit test code.
● Experience working with scalable systems that are used by a high volume of users.
● Experience working in Agile development environments.
● Technologies used: AngularJS, Bootstrap 3, Java, Gulp, Bower, Spring MVC, RESTful, Node.JS, Json, HTML5,   
CSS3, Freemarker Templates

_Cashier, A1 Esso _
_Markham, Ontario — September 2013 - May 2014_
Processed transactions quickly and efficiently while taking security and safety precautions.
Accomplishments
● Educated customers about new schemes and promotional activities that could benefit them.
● Maintained a friendly and cordial relationship with the customers by greeting them and assisting them with all relevant issues. 
● Maintained registers and all books related to cash transactions and kept them up to date.

**EDUCATION**
_Health Informatics Technology (Adv. Diploma), Centennial College_
_Toronto, Ontario (Canada) — September 2012 - May 2014_
➢ Cumulative GPA of 3.86/4.5
➢ Centennial College ICET Chair Award 2014 for www.cencolshare.com as Innovative software application.

_Bachelor of Computer Science, Punjab Technical University _
_Jalandhar, Punjab (India)— August  2008 - August 2012_
➢ Graduated with a percentage of 73/100

**Projects**
_TinkMe - www.tinkme.com_
TinkMe is a positive ratings system where users can vote for their favourite items, without disparaging the competition. “Tink” and “Review” is criteria to make review Items popular. All the reviews are analysed by review team and then allowed to be posted on the review item page. I.P. Address tracking is used to allow only one “Tink” per I.P. address. Admin Dashboard allows admin to manage the content posted on the website like Review Items, Users, Contact Us Queries. Top Review items in Categories help audience to decide the best review item based on public reviews.
Technologies:  AngularJS, Bootstrap 3, Java, Spring MVC, MYSQL, JSON, JPA, Hibernate, Spring-Data, RESTful, Json, Mailgun API, Twilio SMS API

_Thomas Keeper - www.thomaskeeper.com_
Web based platform to allow users to search MLS Listings of Calgary. Website allows user to stay connected and updated to real estate market.
Technologies: Bootstrap 3 , MYSQL, JSON, AngularJS, NodeJS, RESTful, CSS3

_CencolShare - www.cencolshare.com_
Web platform that students can use  to share academic documents and discuss the topics on it. Tool for conducting 
discussions online about surveys, articles, literature, technology or any matter of that sort online. Students can actively participate and communicate with other members, form groups and share knowledge about the content that they have.
Technologies: JQuery, Bootstrap 3, Java, Spring MVC, MYSQL, JSON, JPA,JSP, Hibernate, Spring-Data 

_Medical Information Management System _
Application will increase operational efficiency and patient safety in healthcare service via a seamless information system that address information input redundancy, maintenance of patient records, fast turn-around time, and quality clinical administration of service.
Technologies: C#, SQL Server, Stored Procedures 

**REFERENCES**
_Available upon request._
